subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Claudio Reyna, a midfielder and the U.S captain, and Ronaldo, Brazil's star striker, may be ready for the beginning of the World Cup, but the status of other prominent players remains in question.
snippet: Claudio Reyna, a midfielder and the U.S captain, and Ronaldo, Brazil's star striker, may be ready for the beginning of the World Cup, but the status of other prominent players remains in question.
